# Overview
This page provides information about the computer program HMMVMS, an R package for detecting fishing activity from VMS data.










# References
The model and algorithm underlying the HMMVMS program are described in 

* Guillot, Gilles, Pierre Benoit, Savvas Kinalis, Fran√ßois Bastardie, and Valerio Bartolino. "Enhancing and comparing methods for the detection of fishing activity from Vessel Monitoring System data." arXiv preprint [arXiv:1708.09663](https://arxiv.org/abs/1708.09663) (2017).
